entry.title: A Scandal in Metropolis
entry.summary:
Author: Belayoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,494Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 45

Summary: Lex Luthor has something scandalous on a hard drive, and he’s using it to create shady dealings in broad daylight. The Batman sets out to retrieve the coveted item, however his meticulous plan gets foiled by a bumbling reporter who is far more dangerous than he seems. Bruce’s world is completely derailed when Clark Kent turns out to be the most interesting and most captivating person in his life. But he’s certainly not in love. Or: a Sherlock Holmes rewrite with a twist.

entry.title: How to Investigate a Bat's Heart
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,299Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 319

Summary: Bruce Wayne has been acting…strange. Disappearing on nights when there’s no patrol, coming home looking suspiciously glowy, and receiving mysterious gifts at the manor’s doorstep—flowers, pies, baskets of fresh fruit. To Dick, it’s obvious: Bruce has finally discovered a wholesome hobby.To Jason, it’s clearer: Bruce is definitely hooking up with someone.To Damian, it’s undeniable: they’re about to get a new sibling if no one figures this out fast. Determined not to be left in the dark, the Wayne brothers launch a secret investigation into their father’s suspicious behavior. Between banter, botched surveillance, and the constant risk of Bruce catching them in the act, the trio will uncover more than just a mystery—they’ll learn a little about family, love, and how far they’ll go to protect the Bat.

entry.title: The clouds are getting pretty as the sky gets dark
entry.summary:
Author: starstruckpirate

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,322Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 30

Summary: Clark and Bruce are exes who don't agree on who broke whose heart. (Bruce broke it first when he never let Clark stay the night. Clark broke things off when his hero duties got in the way of their relationship). Both are too stubborn to admit they still care about each other, too wounded to try to reconcile. Superman and Batman are an unstoppable force and an immovable object, founders of the League and the one person the other trusts more than anyone. But the truth they don't know about each other keeps them from ever being more than that. --- This is a Superbat fic in which they have been allies for around 15 years but for their various reasons never shared identities. It's also a Bat-Fam fic and plays fast and loose with any established canon for the sake of the story.

entry.title: Cats and Dogs
entry.summary:
Author: riversiders

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,222Chapters: 6/16Kudos: 137

Summary: It's not that he doesn't like Clark. He’s obsessed with Clark, actually, and not just because he somehow conned his way into dating him. As suspicious and crazy as it makes Bruce feel, he cannot deny that Clark cares. He’s constantly checking in on Bruce. They talk on the phone practically every day, and Superman has become a frequent and regular visitor at Wayne Manor. Dick adores him. Alfred does too. He keeps making hints about ‘letting Mr. Kent into the club in an official capacity’. Clark is wonderful. He is good—too good. He won't treat Bruce the way Bruce wants to be treated.
